title: City of Silver Bay, Minnesota | On Lake Superior's Beautiful North Shore
text: CITY OF SILVER BAY SPECIAL JOINT MEETING CITY COUNCIL, MARY MACDONALD COMMITTEE, & ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY The City Council has set a Special Joint Meeting with Mary MacDonald Committee, and Economic Development Authority for the purpose of Reviewing the Facility Assessment Completed by Krause Anderson of the Mary MacDonald building The Special Meeting will be [â€¦]
